Text: Winamp plays it well so does Foobar.
In my opinion, this is the best album.  Ever.
if you're a mac user, convert the songs to apple lossless using xld, I love the sight of '1048kbps' in itunes ^^

WELL SEEDING SPEED 80-100 KBPS!! +1

Just in case: .flac is just another sound format like .mp3 or .wma. 
So you play it like you play a simple .mp3
